00024 void
00025 RequestQueueTest::getItemTest()
00026 {
00027     RequestQueue* queue = new RequestQueue();
00028     int32_t serviceId = 1;
00029     queueItem item;
00030     queueItem* resultItem;
00031     item.methodId = 0;
00032     queue->addItem(serviceId, &item);
00033 
00034     resultItem = queue->getItem(serviceId);
00035     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(resultItem->methodId == item.methodId);
00036 }

00049

00053

00055 }

00057 void
00058 RequestQueueTest::getItemQueueTest()
00059 {
00060     RequestQueue* queue = new RequestQueue();
00061     int32_t serviceId = 1;
00062     queueItem first_item;
00063     queueItem second_item;
00064     queueItem third_item;
00065     
00066     first_item.methodId = 0;
00067     second_item.methodId = 1;
00068     third_item.methodId = 2;
00069 
00070     queue->addItem(serviceId, &first_item);
00071     queue->addItem(serviceId, &second_item);
00072     queue->addItem(2, &third_item);
00073 
00074     std::queue<queueItem*> itemList = queue->getItemQueue(serviceId);
00075     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(itemList.size() == 2);
00076 }

00078 void
00079 RequestQueueTest::getItemQueueByCountTest()
00080 {
00081     RequestQueue* queue = new RequestQueue();
00082     int32_t serviceId = 1;
00083     queueItem first_item;
00084     queueItem second_item;
00085     queueItem third_item;
00086     
00087     first_item.methodId = 0;
00088     second_item.methodId = 1;
00089     third_item.methodId = 2;
00090 
00091     queue->addItem(serviceId, &first_item);
00092     queue->addItem(serviceId, &second_item);
00093     queue->addItem(2, &third_item);
00094 
00095     std::queue<queueItem*> itemList = queue->getItemQueue(serviceId, 1);
00096     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(itemList.size() == 1);
00097 }

00099 void
00100 RequestQueueTest::getServiceIdsTest()
00101 {
00102     RequestQueue* queue = new RequestQueue();
00103     int32_t serviceId = 1;
00104     queueItem first_item;
00105     queueItem second_item;
00106     queueItem third_item;
00107     
00108     first_item.methodId = 0;
00109     second_item.methodId = 1;
00110     third_item.methodId = 2;
00111 
00112     queue->addItem(serviceId, &first_item);
00113     queue->addItem(serviceId, &second_item);
00114     queue->addItem(2, &third_item);
00115 
00116     std::vector<int32_t> idList = queue->getServiceIds();
00117     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(idList.size() == 2);
00118     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(idList[0] == serviceId);
00119     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(idList[1] == 2);
00120 }
00121 
00122 void
00123 RequestQueueTest::queueLockTest()
00124 {
00125     RequestQueue* queue = new RequestQueue();
00126     pthread_mutex_t thread_mutex;
00127     struct timespec timeout;
00128 
00129     pthread_mutex_init(&thread_mutex, NULL);
00130 
00131     // mutex should be locked
00132     queue->queueLock(&thread_mutex);
00133 
00134     clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, &timeout);
00135     int result = pthread_mutex_timedlock(&thread_mutex, &timeout);
00136 
00137     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(result != 0);
00138 
00139     queueItem* item = new queueItem();
00140     item->methodId = 1;
00141 
00142     queue->addItem(0, item);
00143 
00144     // mutex should be unlocked
00145     clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, &timeout);
00146     result = pthread_mutex_timedlock(&thread_mutex, &timeout);
00147     
00148     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(result == 0);
00149 }
